info.name: USDT (Arbitrum)
info.comment: The minimum deposit amount is 1 USDT. If you want to deposit USDT via the Arbitrum One network, please make sure to use the ARB wallet address. Contract address: contains fcbb9.

info.name: USDT (Arbitrum)
info.comment: The minimum withdrawal amount is 10 USDT. If you want to withdraw USDT via the Arbitrum One network, please make sure to use the ARB wallet address.

info.name: USDT (BNB Chain)
info.comment: The minimum deposit amount is 1 USDT. If you want to deposit USDT via the BSC network, please make sure to use the BSC wallet address. Contract address: contains 97955.

info.name: USDT (ERC20)
info.comment: The minimum deposit amount is 10 USDT. If you want to deposit USDT via the Ethereum network, please make sure to use the ERC-20 wallet address. Contract address: contains 31ec7.

info.name: USDT (ERC20)
info.comment: If you want to withdraw USDT via the Ethereum network, please make sure to use an ERC-20 wallet address.

info.name: USDT (OMNI)
info.comment: Minimum deposit amount is 10 USDT

info.name: USDT (OMNI)
info.comment: Do not withdraw directly to the Crowdfunding or ICO address as your account will not be credited with tokens from such sales.

info.name: LTC
info.comment: When depositing LTC, please note that we support only the Litecoin network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for LTC deposits.

info.name: LTC
info.comment: When withdrawing LTC, please note that we support only the Litecoin network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for LTC withdrawals.

info.name: ETH
info.comment: If you want to deposit ETH via the Ethereum network, please make sure to use the Ethereum wallet address.

info.name: ETH
info.comment: When withdrawing ETH, please note that we support only the Ethereum network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for ETH withdrawals.

info.name: ETH (Binance Smart Chain)
info.comment: The minimum deposit amount is 0.01 ETH. If you want to deposit ETH via the BSC network, please make sure to use the BSC wallet address. Contract address: contains 933F8.

info.name: ETH (Polygon)
info.comment: This address only supports deposits of Wrapped ETH (WETH) on the Polygon network. Sending ETH (WETH) via other networks will result in irreversible loss of funds.

info.name: XRP
info.comment: When withdrawing XRP, please note that we support only the Ripple network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for XRP withdrawals. To guarantee your withdrawal is credited correctly, please make sure to include the destination tag.

info.name: XRP
info.comment: When depositing XRP, please note that we support only the Ripple network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for XRP deposits. To guarantee your deposit is credited correctly, please make sure to include the destination tag.

info.name: XRP
info.comment: When withdrawing XRP, please note that we support only the Ripple network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for XRP withdrawals. To guarantee your withdrawal is credited correctly, please make sure to include the destination tag.

info.name: XRP
info.comment: When depositing XRP, please note that we support only the Ripple network. We do not support the Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20) network for XRP deposits. To guarantee your deposit is credited correctly, please make sure to include the destination tag.
